titles.title: Local Task Forces on 21st Century Policing Act of 2019
To authorize grantees of Department of Justice grants to set up task forces on policing in local communities, and for other purposes.
Local Task Forces on 21st Century Policing Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary:
Local Task Forces on 21st Century Policing Act of 2019
This bill allows a state or local government to use Edward Byrne Memorial Justice Assistance Grant Program funds to establish a task force to promote an effective partnership between law enforcement officers and the communities they serve.
